attributes.action: Put Disabled People With Indefinite DLA Awards ON P.I.P. Automatically
attributes.additional_details: Exempt disabled people with Indefinite DLA Awards from further assessments. The stress and worry is enormous and life threatening. Doctors and consultants can supply medical information and this should be enough to show how much these people are suffering already. Put these people on the highest rate of P.I.P. and calm their fears of losing everything, they suffer enough just to stay alive.
